entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Malay Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malay Falls 01:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending overnight. Periods of rain along parts of the coast overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
